  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDto, ProjectAwareDto, ReferableDto, VersionedReferableDto, WriteControlledDto, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadOnlyInboxDto

    public class InboxDto
extends ArtifactDto
    Wraps an inbox item and the associated artifact.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • InboxDto

        public InboxDto(InboxDto inbox,
        ArtifactAdditionalInfoDto additional,
        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> attributes)
        Create a shallow copy of the specified inbox
        Parameters:
        inbox - definition to copy
        additional - is a different additional info to use. If null, a clone of the inbox additional info will be used
        attributes - are different additional attributes to use, or null to copy the attributes of the original inbox

      • InboxDto

        Create a shallow copy of the specified inbox

      • parseMailServerPort

        public static InboxDto.HostAndPort parseMailServerPort(java.lang.String mailServer)
                                                throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Parse out the default mail server port from the mailServer name, which may contain it as "host:port" format.
        Parameters:
        mailServer - The mail-server string
        Returns:
        The structure-class contains the host and port number, the port number is null for default port
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if some port is provided, but that is an invalid number
